name: Yin Yang Path
description:
Yin and Yang are symbols of balance and balance it must complement each other.
In this game you have to unite Yin and Yang. You must follow the path, you have to control the Yin and Yang together to be able follow the path, Do not touch the wall or you will die.
There are 50 levels to be completed, each level has its own difficulties.
This game can improve the balance of the brain, because you have to concentrate on seeing and controlling the yin and that without touching the wall.
level 40-50 controllers will be reversed, this will complicate you while making this game very challenging
